metadata.title: CVE-2021-32078 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An Out-of-Bounds Read was discovered inarch/arm/mach-footbridge/personal-pci.c in the Linux kernel through 5.12.11because of the lack of a check for a value that shouldn't be negative,e.g., access to element -2 of an array, aka CID-298a58e165e4.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
